# steps

**Instance Property**

The array of steps that create the overall route.

## Declaration

```swift
var steps: [MKRoute.Step] { get }
```

## Discussion

The array contains one or more [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MKRoute/Step] objects representing distinct portions of the route. Each step corresponds to a single direction that must be followed along the route.

## Getting the route geometry

- **polyline**: The detailed route geometry.
- **MKRoute.Step**: One portion of an overall route.
